Since the Steam controller is now a thing I thought we could share our presets here, so I begin

http://imgur.com/a/IO2ef

I made this one to fly planes and use BDArmory, the layout is pretty much the same as a PS controller for the Ace Combat games except the right pad don't do anything but I could maybe map the gears/radar settings here.

With all this porting to the consoles I was wondering how the game would fair on a Steam controller. I was thinking that you would need the 1-1 input of the touch pads to build craft in the VAB. How is that going for you?
I use it only for flying, I still build with my mouse but I could try with the controller.

The Powerglove barely worked to begin with, and the U-force *works*, but is still a bit weak compared to the remote. So getting the Powerglove to work with a PC, is going to be a record challenge, especially for a game it isn't programmed for AND IS 30 years too new!! Same deal with the U-force.
